0.2.name: wordpress/developer-info
0.2.description:
NOTICE: This plugin is in the painful-to-use stage of beta. Unless you are extremely daring, I recommend holding off on downloading until it has made some progress. You've been warned.

Unlike the other plugins floating around that achieve similar goals, this plugin does not page scrape. Instead, this plugin directly accesses the Plugin & Theme Info API, making it put less load on your server and provide much more flexibility. Additionally, since the plugin does not depend on the format of the HTML pages that page scrapers use, it is far more reliable long-term.
